Description:
P 060821/QW/G01,  311848678 - Work is being carried out without measures, including water dust suppression, local exhaust ventilation and respiratory protective equipment, to reduce the exposure of employees to respirable crystalline silica.

P 060821/QW/MG02,  311848882 - Work is being carried out without measures, including water dust suppression, local exhaust ventilation and respiratory protective equipment, to reduce the exposure of employees to respirable crystalline silica.

I 0 6 0 821/QW/MG03, 311849822  - You have failed to carry out a suitable and sufficient assessment of the risks to your employees from respirable crystalline silica, a hazardous substance liable to cause silicosis and lung cancer, to which they are being exposed through the cutting and sanding of engineered stone slabs containing quartz.

I 0 6 0 821/QW/MG04, 311849850 -  You have failed to carry out a suitable and sufficient assessment of the risks, both to the health and safety of your employees to which they are exposed whilst they are at work, and to the health and safety of persons not in your employment arising out of, or in connection with, your undertaking.
